articles.author: Liz Rymill
articles.title: Indigenous cricket legends prepare to return to Edenhope for 1988 reunion
articles.description: Before the all-Indigenous team left for England, they beat the Prime Minister's XI, which featured Ian Chappell and Len Pascoe, in Sydney.
articles.content:
Thirty-five years after an all-Indigenous cricket team toured England, played at the game's hallowed Lord's Cricket Ground and met Queen Elizabeth II, a reunion is taking shape.
But far from English… [+5088 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
